item.title: Historic tunnel created under the Alps to connect Italy and Austria
RFK Jr. announces move to decertify organ procurement organization
item.description: HHS Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announced a move to decertify an organ procurement organization and steps to reform the organ donation system.

item.title: Hurricane Helene displaced thousands of students. Some struggled to get back on track with school
Spirit Airlines to cut capacity by 25% this fall, hints at layoffs
item.description: Capacity cuts "will inevitably affect the size of our teams," Spirit Airlines CEO Dave Davis said in a memo to employees.

item.title: US jobless aid applications retreat to 231,000 after surging to nearly 4-year high
item.description: The number of Americans applying for jobless aid last week retreated significantly after surging to a nearly four-year high a week earlier

item.title: Shooting kills 3 officers and wounds 2 more in rural Pennsylvania. Police say the shooter is dead
item.description: Authorities have been investigating a shooting that killed three officers and wounded two more in rural southern Pennsylvania.
